summary: Completed testing of 'My Invoices' page feature. Backend: 6/6 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All UI flows verified successfully. Invoice page shows sign-in prompt when not authenticated, and empty state with 'Upgrade to Premium' button when authenticated with no invoices.
critical_code_review_comments: Invoices page correctly shows authentication prompt when not logged in
Empty state with 'Upgrade to Premium' button displays correctly when no invoices exist
Profile Activity menu includes 'Invoices & Receipts' menu item with correct route
Backend /api/invoices endpoint properly returns 401 for unauthenticated requests
Invoice HTML rendering endpoint properly validates ownership before returning invoice
seed_data_creation: Used existing test user from previous iterations
context_for_next_testing_agent: My Invoices page at /profile/invoices is fully implemented. Backend API /api/invoices returns user invoices (empty list for new users). The page shows sign-in prompt when unauthenticated and empty state with 'Upgrade to Premium' when authenticated with no invoices. Profile Activity menu includes 'Invoices & Receipts' link in mobile view.

invoices_api_authenticated.details: GET /api/invoices returns 200 with invoices list when authenticated

frontend_invoices_page_unauthenticated.details: Shows 'Please sign in to view invoices' message with Sign In button

frontend_invoices_page_authenticated_emp.details: Shows 'No Invoices Yet' empty state with 'Upgrade to Premium' button

profile_activity_menu_invoices_link.details: 'Invoices & Receipts' menu item present in Profile Activity section (mobile view)
